content: make a crochet bluebell flower with my easy step by step written tutorial crochet pattern includes step by step written / photo instructions to make these dainty crochet flowers plus the crochet leaves make your own crochet flowers with any yarn from your stash & the matching crochet hook a quick easy pattern ideal for every crocheter pattern made using any yarn size of your choice with crochet hook to match your yarn size skill level easy if you have any queries or questions feel free to contact me at any time i am always here & happy to help to get the latest news & updates on moara crochet please follow me on instagram at www instagram com/moara_crochet or like my page at https //www facebook com/moaracrochet this pattern is copyright moara crochet © each pattern has taken many hours to provide clear instructions & been tested if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished product as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer and provide a link to my etsy shop if you re selling online thank you roseanna
